main.name: Jakob Manne
main.description: I am currently working for Norway's best, one of the largest tourism companies in Norway
main.bio: Hi, I lead and manage technology initiatives at Norway's best, one of the largest tourism companies in Norway. My focus is on optimizing systems, data platforms, and digital infrastructure to enhance operations and improve the customer experience. I have transitioned from a technical role to overseeing technology at a higher level, ensuring that our tech solutions align with business goals.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to contact me, please reach out by email.

education.description: One exchange semester at Rice University, Houston, USA via Grunderskolen. Title of my master thesis was, What characterizes companies that implement cross-industry innovation?

education.school: Western Norway University of Applied Sciences
education.description: Awards at the Department of Computing, Mathematics and Physics: Award for best bachelor project report. Project topic was “Digital Healthcare Forms”.  Social environment award for contributing to creating a good social environment at the department.

work.title: Chief Technology Officer
work.description: Leading and managing technology initiatives across Norway's Best. Responsible for optimizing systems, data platforms, and digital infrastructure to enhance operations and improve the customer experience. Working at the intersection of technology, business strategy, and digital transformation to ensure scalable and efficient solutions.

work.title: Chief Technology Officer
work.description: Development of Cutters' technology platform. Working at the intersection of technology, user experience and business development. I'm a key person in the technical development of the company where I am involved in the whole process from idea to delivery.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Hired as an external consultant to a major oil & gas company. Further development of a planning tool for drilling oil wells. Used WCF, Sencha, SQL.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Further development of a library that is used to process seismic data. Built a .NET Standard wrapper on top of a library written in C.

work.title: Junior Software Developer
work.description: Working parttime besides my master studies. Worked in several areas such as payments, concept development, and everyday banking. Used C#/.NET stack as well as React.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Branding, webpage development, marketing of GOOSE Society of Texas, a super angel investment group.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Product management and configuration of solutions for automation and digitization of manual work processes.
